document_data.name: Edmund
document_data.mainbody:
'''Edmund''' was a [[warlock]] who lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I'm not going to say I had no choice, because that would be a lie. But I don't regret it. I'm a new man. I feel strong for the first time in my life...If you dont' reply to this letter, I understand. And if you don't want me to come back at all, well, I understand that too.|Edmund, in his letter to Miriam.}}
document_data.Abilities: Through his pact with a [[cambion]], Edmund acquired powerful [[warlock]] powers.
document_data.Relationships: He was in love with a woman named [[Miriam (Sword Coast)|Miriam]] who unfortunately got involved with the criminal known as [[Maggie Two-Fingers]].
document_data.History:
After Edmund and Miriam fell on hard times, Edmund was visited by a cambion, who offered him a way out of their dire straits. The [[half-fiend]] offered Edmund [[infernal pact|infernal powers]] in exchange for something in return.

Armed with the eldritch powers of a warlock, Edmund received a significant payment from a mercenary group in exchange for promise of work. He paid off Maggie Two-Fingers in full, before heading off to [[Icewind Dale]] with the mercenaries. He wrote a letter to his beloved, but unfortunately it was picked up by [[harpies]].
